text: (marrullavarute) vivahabandhattilirikkunna strikalum (ninnalkk nisid'dhamakkappettirikkunnu.) ninnalute kaikal utamappetuttiyavar (atimastrikal) olike. ninnalute mel allahuvinre niyamamatre it‌. atinnappuramulla strikalumayi ninnalute dhanam (mah‌rayi) nalkikkeant ninnal (vivahabandham) tetunnat ninnalkk anuvadikkappettirikkunnu. ninnal vaivahika jivitam laksyamakkunnavarayirikkanam. nicavrtti agrahikkunnavarakarut‌. annane avaril ninn ninnal valla sukhavumanubhaviccal avarkkulla vivahamulyam oru badhyata enna nilayil ninnal nalkentatan‌. badhyata (vivahamulyam) niscayiccatinu sesam ninnal an'yean'yam trptippett valla vittuvilcayum ceyyunnatil ninnalkk kurrameannumilla. tirccayayum allahu ellam ariyunnavanum yuktimanumakunnu
